posts.cpp: class Solution {--newline--public:--newline--    int lengthOfLastWord(string s) { --newline--        int len = 0, tail = s.length() - 1;--newline--        while (tail >= 0 && s[tail] == ' ') tail--;--newline--        while (tail >= 0 && s[tail] != ' ') {--newline--            len++;--newline--            tail--;--newline--        }--newline--        return len;--newline--    }--newline--};

class Solution {--newline--public:--newline--     int lengthOfLastWord(const char* s) {--newline--            int len = 0;--newline--            while (*s) {--newline--                if (*s++ != ' ')--newline--                    ++len;--newline--                else if (*s && *s != ' ')--newline--                    len = 0;--newline--        --newline--            }--newline--            return len;--newline--        }--newline--}

posts.java: public class Solution {--newline--    public int lengthOfLastWord(String s) {--newline--        return s.trim().length()-s.trim().lastIndexOf(" ")-1;--newline--    }--newline--}
